name: Pink Heaven
description: A certain office lady is back!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: 1.2GHz (2CPUs) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 256Mbyte DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 500MByte DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Like its 'prequel' Pink Hour, this is a 20 minute or less game, meant to be a little tease for Daisuke Amaya's title 'Kero Blaster,' for the price of free. Pink Heaven isn't really worth your time as a stand alone title due to lack of content but it's also free.
Nice game with a cool retro vibe. Easy, short. Makes you smile. I feel like I missed something, though, as if there are hidden treats I overlooked. I'm going to play it all over again.
Great game.
100%'ed the game. It was fun.
You know you're bad when you rage to a 6 level game.   10/10 would save shopkeeper again
Short game, just like Pink Hour. Love it, play this and Pink Hour, get hyped for Kero Blaster! I sure am!
Very nice game production. But for the first time to strengthen two option does not balance, gameplay remains to be strengthened, looking forward to the follow-up work.
much like the 1st but a lot better
Short Review
This is a great little game. Not to long but then again it's free so what do you expect. I mean it's free and fun, so why haven't you downloaded this game yet?

Well that was an entertaining expirence.  Took less time to beat this morning than my coffee to start brewing.  Nice touch with the light-hearted Kero Blaster promo at the end.  Definitely a game worth having only 2 hearts to start with, because 3 would really have been over powered.... despite having your first weapon a pratical Pink-Hadoken Machine Gun. I got to revive black and broken burnt husks of plants back into pretty pink Flowers with it.  Nice with its simplicity, I pretty much could have whipped this thing out myself with GameMaker 8.0 in about 2 hours. tops.  But on the other hand, it is a Demo given out as an apetizer for one of its upcoming games.   pros:  + Cute + A Nolstalgic tool to sweetly kiss 15 minutes away while waiting for a download  Cons: - When I first tried to resize the window to 2x in its window size options, the game crashed and force closed.. besides that happening, I re-opened the game again, and the setting 2x i selected went into effect.  that was the only con I found really.
Very short and not very interesting.
I found out that this Pink Office Lady is very nice and friendly. Making me want to ♥♥♥♥ her so hard
its cute, fun, and freeeee.
Even more pink than the last one.  Has 2 endings. One's more pink than the other.
game of the year   11/10 IGN
total of 4.5 min and the game is finished lol.
It's fun.
still can't beat hard difficulty
Bein' strong ain't all it's cracked up to be. It takes a gentle touch to truly help a friend. 10/10. Would learn a metaphorical life lesson from a game about a pink puff again.
Game with short story,but this game is very fun for me :D
Considering the last game, the sweetness of the ending actually caught me by surprise. A very nice, short game with adorable graphics. Definitely worth checking out.
More emotional and captivating and enjoyable than Undertale.
if it was a full game and not just ademo it would be worth playing.
A FREE miniscule game that is a sequel to Pink Hour with Kero Blaster gameplay mechanics.
Cute little game. Two endings. Maybe take ya 15 minutes to play through it?

As crazy as it might look, Kero Blaster's teaser actually got a sequel. The teaser. Got a sequel. AND IT'S A BLAST! It's just little bit longer than the first one and it features TWO stages instead of just one (wow, now that's some edgy teaser, huh?), and the cute graphics, music and story are all still there, just the way you know you want it to be. Also, Hard Mode is still a thing and holy amphibian on a bike, this is way harder than the first one, be ready to spend more than your regular 10 minutes on this game if you plan to master all the perfect jumps that you need to beat this. 10/10, just download it already, for frog's sake.
HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE? THIS IS BETTER THAN PINK HOUR I RATE 666/10  PLAY IT NOW
